name: six games
description:
six games is a collection of unfiltered interactive and visual art created one each week during six weeks

  • 000 is a kinetic visual-scream featuring my hand and a wild ass donkey
  • 001 is an innovative die & retry platforming mess
  • 002 is a wince hypersomniac text box
  • 003 is a ping-golf disco ball that couldn't quite get over it
  • 004 is an electric zine with bells and no whistle
  • 005 is an interactive music/noise creation toy

content warning: most if not all of these projects contain abrasive visuals and flashes

trigger warnings: refer to the 00x.txt text files in the downloaded archive

individual elements of this collection were previously self-published on kdx.re, i'm releasing this collection on itch in a preservation and accessibility effort
